TopicTitle: Need advice on what Mods to install

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, new here. I've been playing this wonderful game for a couple of weeks now, during this time I've been reading and watching videos about the different Mods that can be used..

With the new release of 0.17, can anyone here suggest a list of 'safe' and useful Mods to install, like a basic starter pack or something.

Cheers,
